posts.content:
Hello all and thank you for keeping this great game alive!

Having recently re-installed it along with all community patches I discovered the Eye of Gruumsh class. Looking through this forum I didn't find any build using it yet, so I have been trying to tackle with one. I have been trying to build a Barbarian 15 / Cleric 15 / Eye of Gruumsh 10 that would use Terrifying Rage and all Cleric buffs. I tried to use Max Kane's Terrifying Priest of Kord (terrifying-priest-of-kord-cleric-19-bar ... 54381.html) as template, but so far I'm stuck. Does anyone have suggestions as to how best order each class to get to the result? Or is it unfeasible? Another idea was to go Bard instead of Cleric for UMD and Song Buffs, but I'm quite partial to the Cleric version. Thanks in advance for all your feedback.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hello there Findaruil and welcome aboard!

I hate to be a thickie, but it's a gift. Can I just ask what the Eye of Gruumsh class is, or does, and what its prerequisites are (if any)?

Cheers

posts.author: Findaruil
posts.content:
I believe the class was installed with the latest CEP along with Shou Disciple and Purple Dragon Knight. Here are the characteristics:

Max 10 levels, Hit die d12, Simple and Martial Weapons, Light and Med Armor, Shields, Skillpoints 2+Int

Prerequisites: Alignment Chaotic evil, Neutral evil or Chaotic Neutral; Race Half-Orc or Orc; Feats Exotic Weapon Prof., Weapon Focus (Double Axe); BAB +6

What it gives you is an improved version of Blind Fight, an improved Rage (Str +4, armor bonus -4), +3 natural armor bonus, +2 saving throws and the ability to spit your stomach's content into your opponent's eyes (yes, that's what it says! :) )

Thanks for the answer!
